Team-killing is against the rules!
If this was a mistake then you must explain yourself and apologise, otherwise they will mark you as a team-killer and you could be kicked.

1. Keep bad language to a minimum. If you have a problem with another player, take it to them directly.
2. NO VOIP IN GLOBAL OR SIDE (Unless BLUFOR/OPFOR). Use the channels or Discord!.
3. Teamkilling when you are in BLUFOR or OPFOR is FORBIDDEN and punishable by kick/ban. Play as Independent if you want free-for-all action.
4. Revealing information about your (ex)team to other teams is lame and not appreciated
5. Do not exploit R3F or any other add-ons or you will be banned.
6. Using or spamming with loud\long custom sound commands will cause punishment up to a permanent ban
